sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均表示"勤奋的"之意。
means: diligent ： 多指为一定的目的或追求而勤奋。
industrious ： 指由习惯养成或天性形成的勤奋。

sentence.Network_en: It is a harmonious community where pupils are happy and industrious.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个和睦的集体，学生们开心玩耍，用功读书。

sentence.Network_en: If the tiller is industrious, the farmland is productive.
We Chinese people are brave and industrious.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们中国人是勇敢勤劳的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'skilful, clever, ingenious'): from French industrieux or late Latin industriosus, from Latin industria 'diligence'

entry.def: If you describe someone as industrious, you mean they work very hard.

example.ex: She was an industrious and willing worker.
example.tran: 她是个勤劳肯干的员工。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by hard work and perseverance
2. working hard to promote an enterprise

auth_sentence.content: Businesses cannot flourish if ordinary workers are not industrious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Businesses cannot flourish if ordinary workers are not industrious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Businesses cannot flourish if ordinary workers are not industrious.

auth_sentence.content: We all know how industrious the stereotype government worker is.
auth_sentence.res_content: We all know how industrious the stereotype government worker is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We all know how industrious the stereotype government worker is.

auth_sentence.content: She is incredibly industrious, and her products are sent everywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is incredibly industrious, and her products are sent everywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is incredibly industrious, and her products are sent everywhere.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可破坏的, 易毁坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: destruct破坏+ible能……的→adj.可破坏的, 易毁坏的
destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
stems_affixes.word_buile: instrument[n.工具,仪器,器械;乐器]+al……的→adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
stems_affixes.word_buile: construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]+ion表名词→n.建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+struct建立,结构+ion表名词→建造在下面
super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

means.word_mean: 勤劳的, 勤奋的,忙碌的

sentences.en: We Chinese people are brave and industrious.
sentences.cn: 我们中国人是勇敢勤劳的。

sentences.en: He is industrious about his study.
